name: Forge
description:
Tiling and window manager for GNOME

MAJOR CHANGES

 - New Tabbed Tiling Implementation via St.Widget.
 - New style declarations will reset the custom stylesheets for users when updating. Old styles will be backed up as $HOME/.config/forge/stylesheet/forge/stylesheet.css.bak.

 Please report bugs/issues on https://github.com/jmmaranan/forge/issues
